snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s proposal to have Albany allow New York City to set a higher minimum wage was quickly spurned by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo quickly spurns Mayor Bill de Blasio's proposal to ask permission from the State Legislature for New York City to set a higher minimum wage.

byline.contributor: Nikita Stewart and Kate Taylor contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s proposal to have Albany allow New York City to set a higher minimum wage was quickly spurned by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.

headline.main: Cuomo Rejects Another Plan by de Blasio: Minimum Wage
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Rejects Another Plan by de Blasio: Minimum Wage
